    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Environmental Politics &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/envpol
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

        Print Guide
       </a>
      </span>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17116140">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116140">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116140">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Background Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116140">
          <div id="boxatt17116140" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21650376">
              <a id="link_21650376" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21650376,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Politics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas. Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17116141">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116141">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116141">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding News Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116141">
          <div id="boxatt17116141" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link21650381">
              <a id="link_21650381" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21650381,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Politics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21650382">
              <a id="link_21650382" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21650382,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Politics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369574}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more.  Full text is linked directly in the database.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link21650391">
              <a id="link_21650391" href="http://www.sciencedaily.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21650391,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Environmental Politics', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12369606}); ">
               ScienceDaily
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A web site devoted to science news covering "all fields of the physical, biological, earth and applied sciences. Stories are integrated with photographs and illustrations, links to journals and academic studies, related research and topics, encyclopedia articles, and videos."  See also the Environmental Policy News subsection.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17116142">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116142">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116142">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Legal and Government Information
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116142">
          <p>
           NOTE: Relevant legal and government information may be findable through
           <a href="https://www.google.com/">
            Google
           </a>
           searching.
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://www.law.georgetown.edu/library/research/guides/environmental.cfm#federal-laws">
             Environmental Law Research Guide: Federal Laws
            </a>
            <br />
            This chart summarizes a few of the more important federal environmental laws.
           </p>
           <p>
            Federal Agencies and Departments
           </p>
           <ul>
            <ul>
             <li>
              <a href="http://energy.gov/">
               Department of Energy
              </a>
              <ul>
               <li>
                <a href="http://energy.gov/em/office-environmental-management">
                 Office of Environmental Management
                </a>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://www.interior.gov/index.cfm">
               Department of the Interior
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://epa.gov/">
               Environmental Protection Agency
              </a>
              <ul>
               <li>
                <a href="http://www2.epa.gov/laws-regulations">
                 EPA Laws and Regulations
                </a>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://www.fws.gov/">
               Fish and Wildlife Service
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://www.fs.fed.us/">
               Forest Service
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://www.noaa.gov/">
               National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="http://www.nrcs.usda.gov/wps/portal/nrcs/site/national/home/">
               Natural Resources Conservation Service
              </a>
              (USDA)
             </li>
            </ul>
           </ul>
           <p>
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3874373">
             Find Government Information
            </a>
            (Trexler Library, Muhlenberg College)
            <br />
            A list of resources to help you find U.S. and international government information.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://www.law.cornell.edu/world/">
             Legal Information Institute
            </a>
            (Cornell University)
            <br />
            Legal collections include: Federal law, Constitution, U.S. Code, Code of Federal Regulations, Supreme Court, Federal Rules, State law resources, State statutes by topic, and more.
           </p>
           <blockquote>
            <p>
             <a href="http://www.law.cornell.edu/wex/environmental_law">
              Environmental Law
             </a>
             <br />
             See the Resources tab for links to federal, state, and international materials.
            </p>
            <p>
             <a href="http://www.law.cornell.edu/world/">
              Law by source: Global
             </a>
             <br />
             The LII collection of world legal materials gathers, country by country, continent by continent, the Internet-accessible sources of the constitutions, statutes, judicial opinions, and related legal material from around the globe (excluding the U.S. material held in the LII's other collections). It also holds resources and document collections of International Law.
            </p>
           </blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            <br />
            U.S. legal information includes: federal and state cases; Supreme Court briefs; Federal Statutes, Codes &amp; Regulations; State Statutes, Codes &amp; Regulations; and more.&nbsp; International legal information includes cases and legislation for Canada, EU, Commonwealth, and Other Nations.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/congressional">
             ProQuest Congressional
            </a>
            <br />
            Information from the U.S. legislature, including full text of bills from 1989 on, public laws from 1988 on, committee reports from 1990 on, House and Senate documents from 1995 on, Congressional Record from 1985 on, Federal Register from 1980 on, and more government information.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17116142" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17116143">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116143">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116143">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Finding Scholarly Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116143">
          <p>
           <strong>
            SEARCHING FOR ARTICLES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            See a list of all article databases via the Library Homepage &nbsp;--&nbsp; Research&nbsp; --&nbsp;
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/databases-az.html">
             Databases A-Z
            </a>
            .
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Check the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=356743">
             Subject Guides
            </a>
            (linked from the Library Homepage in the Research area ) for other recommended databases for this and other subject areas.
           </em>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Environmental Studies / Sciences Databases
             </strong>
            </em>
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=8gh">
             GreenFile
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of both scholarly and general interest items focusing on the ways humans affect the environment. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.sciencedirect.com/">
             ScienceDirect
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journals published by Elsevier in the areas of health, life, and physical sciences. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search Encompass Search by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Political Science / Policy Databases
             </strong>
            </em>
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/pais/ip?accountid=40980">
             PAIS
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more from on domestic and international political, economic, social and public policy issues. Use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/wpsashell/ip?accountid=40980">
             Worldwide Political Science Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations from scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, policy briefs, government publications, and more in political science and complementary fields, including international relations, law, and public administration/policy. Use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             <strong>
              Interdisciplinary Databases
             </strong>
            </em>
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including political science. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the&nbsp;
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/">
             JSTOR
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm">
             Omnifile
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            <span>
             &nbsp;buttons
            </span>
            &nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <strong>
            &nbsp;
           </strong>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17116143" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18460093">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18460093">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18460093">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting the Full Text of Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10536644">
          <p>
           To get the full text of an article, consider the following options:
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you are in Encompass Search or a library database, look for "Check for Full Text buttons," "Access Online," or "Check eResources" buttons. These buttons will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, look for buttons to request the item from another library via interlibrary loan. Or go directly to the
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           request forms.
          </p>
          <p>
           - If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article (see first bullet above). If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           - If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
           <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
            Google Scholar
           </a>
           by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10536644" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17116181">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17116181">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17116181">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Selected Websites: Environmental Advocacy Groups
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17116181">
          <p>
           NOTE: Relevant advocacy and non-profit groups may be findable through
           <a href="https://www.google.com/">
            Google
           </a>
           searching.
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.cleanair.org/">
             Clean Air Council
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.eli.org/index.cfm">
             Environmental Law Institute
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.nrdc.org/about/">
             Natural Resources Defense Council
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.wri.org/">
             World Resources Institute
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            See this list of
            <a href="http://www.nrdc.org/reference/environgroups.asp">
             Environmental Groups
            </a>
            from the NRDC for more...
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17116181" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox18460102">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18460102">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18460102">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content18460062">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.
            <br />
            <br />
           </li>
           <li>
            For help using
            <strong>
             Chicago style
            </strong>
            , consult the following resources::
           </li>
          </ul>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             <em>
              The Chicago manual of style
             </em>
             (16th ed., 2010)
             <br />
             Location:
             <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=Http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org/16/contents.html">
              Online
             </a>
             or search Encompass Search by title or Ready Reference 808.027 C632m
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago Manual of Style (Purdue Online Writing Lab)
             <br />
             <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
              http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago Style (Trexler Library, Muhlenberg College)
             <br />
             <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/media/content,assets/library/docs/chicago_example.pdf">
              http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/media/content,assets/library/docs/chicago_example.pdf
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Chicago/Turabian Documentation Style (Writing Center, University of Wisconsin--Madison)
             <br />
             <a href="http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/DocChicago.html" target="_blank">
              http://www.wisc.edu/writing/Handbook/DocChicago.html
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
             Zotero
            </a>
            <br />
            "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources." Download instructions and help available on the site.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt18460062" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4652019" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18460075">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18460075">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18460075">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need Help with Your Research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17117745">
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
          </p>
          <p>
           <b>
            Jen Jarson
           </b>
           <br />
           Social Sciences Reference Librarian
           <br />
           phone: 484-664-3552
           <br />
           email: jarson@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17117745" class="boxatt">
